title: Is Embibe (online test centre) good for JEE preparation? - Quora

response.answer_text: HELLO ALL!!! To answer your question i feel that there is nothing as good or bad. The thing that suite you might not suite me or vice versa. Since nothing is perfect there are some advantages as disadvantages. If it suits you then you can go ahead and join their course. One more thing that i would like tell you that you should always have options to select from because this gives a perspective to you to see it from a different angle.  EMBIBE It has a great User Interface and simple to use website.They have a good collection of mock test papers and previous year papers.Many inspirational stories and other student useful things like college predictor ,etc. are also available on their website.But it lacks in some departments Android application isn’t that good.It also does not have good enough doubt clearing sessions. As i told you earlier that it is important to keep options in your hand. There are some others in this field that are working as hard as embibe to produce great results. You should check them out and if they suit you then you choose it. ASKIITIAN Start every concept from basics to ensure that students have a smooth jump from 10th and 11th.Students have access to video lectures by one of the best faculties of India. This helps them to get a clear understanding prior to every class. Quick Techniques to manage time and crack complex questions.  KAYSONS EDUCATION This platform has been making a mark for itself in this field continuously producing some great results over the years at a very affordable price. One thing that you should know nothing comes for free and if there is something free then there are always terms and conditions applied which in the long run can hamper your dreams of achieving your goals. The perks of choosing kaysons education are that they have brilliant set of faculties who are well experienced and expertise in their own field. 1.Dr. Joseph Daniel (PhD IIT Kanpur ,22 years teaching experience) 2. Mr. Narendra Singh (IIT-Roorkee, Experience 13 years) 3. Mr. Sudhi Raj Verma (IIT Kanpur, 18 year teaching experiences) 4. Mr. Pawan kumar Verma (IIT- Roorkee experience 15 years) 5. Mr Sanjay Bagga (IIT-Delhi experience 18 years) Apart from the video lectures there are daily assignments that are been given to the students to submit. All india test series are conducted regularly so that students can evaluate themselves on a national scale. The important aspect which a student looks out for is the doubt clearing .They have a well designed system where each and every doubt is resolved properly. Good reference books and class notes.Doubt clearing sessions.Really well organized time table for learning. PLANCESS plancess looks absolutely good with its facilities.Their video lectures are in a board environment and they also provide modules and test series which is a great.They cost around 45,700 for a 2 year program.  ONE THING IS FOR SURE WHICHEVER PLATFORM YOU CHOOSE IT TOTALLY DEPENDS ON YOUR DETERMINATION AND HARDWORK.

Myself subham sahoo aipmt air-140. Though i am not a jee student but on coming across this question regarding embibe i would like to recommend embibe for online preparation. I had subscribed for the one year pack on embibe n the service provided is worth it. The question bank is enormous and the NOTES are quite efficient when u want quick revision or the FINAL REVISION and the best of the lot are the tests, i can assure u that embibe gives the mostly scientific and complete analysis you can ever imagine. The most important factor in aipmt i feel is time, n embibe is conscious about it too. You not only have to get it right but also get it in right time. SPEED AND ACCURACY is the mantra. The weak area analysis helps you to recognise the chapters which need urgent care. The indicator of the marks for getting good college is a constant motivator.  Finally embibe team is quite vibrant in guiding and this i really mean it bcoz i have not picked up their calls several times as they are there even before you need. Sorry team embibe!!
